title: Updated cilent not working.

replies.body: I see you've found a fix that works for you, but keep in mind that workaround might only last temporarily.  Soon enough those old legacy files will be removed, but the inherent issue may be security settings not configured to allow league's files as an exception.  You should go over the steps of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to update those settings, as well as running a repair with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Hope that helps clears things up!

Oh, nevermind! If anyone has this problem, remember to delete 'LeagueCilent.exe' in the Riot games folder, and then run the cilent. 
{{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}
